title: JWT Signing Profile
description:
The jwt_signing_profile block lets you configure a JSON Web Token signing
profile for your gateway. It is referenced in the jwt_sign() function
by its required label.

title: OAuth2
description: The oauth2 block in the Backend Block context configures an OAuth2 flow to request a bearer token for the backend request.

children.value: context configures an OAuth2 flow to request a bearer token for the backend request.
The token received from the authorization server's token endpoint is stored
. So even with flows where a user's account characteristics like username/password or email address are involved, there is no way to "switch" from one user to another depending on the client request.
